example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (PP-DIR (P 从) (LCP (NP (NN 遗址)) (LC 中))) (ADVP (AD 陆续)) (VP (VRD (VV 挖掘) (VV 出)) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-1))))) (DEC 的))) (QP (CD 八千) (CLP (M 件))) (NP (NN 兵马俑))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 完全)) (VP (VP (VV 仿照) (NP-OBJ (ADJP (JJ 真)) (NP (NN 人)))) (VP (VV 造型)))))
example.arg: *OP* *pro* 从 遗址 中 陆续 挖掘 出 *T*-1 的 八千 件 兵马俑
